pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick colors from the palette and assign on 3D view

content.raw: I was still getting the bug by making a building, saving it, closing, then opening the building editor and quickly moving the mouse in and out of the 2D view. Proposed fix is in branch hitl_color_mouse_jackie (78fbaad). I believe that if a QGraphicsView tries to access certain information about a QGraphicsItem that is not in its scene, it will segfault.
